title: Theoretical study on the hydrogen distribution and diffusion at the PuO2/α-Pu2O3 interface
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,16600-16606
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA02257B, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Huang Huang, Min Zhu, Ming Guo, Longxian Li, Yan Li
The interface will not significantly change the doping characteristics of hydrogen in PuO2 and α-Pu2O3, acting as a buffer layer.
